object.name: copyMessages
object.description: Use this method to copy messages of any kind. If some of the specified messages can't be found or copied, they are skipped. Service messages, paid media messages, giveaway messages, giveaway winners messages, and invoice messages can't be copied. A quiz poll can be copied only if the value of the field correct_option_id is known to the bot. The method is analogous to the method forwardMessages, but the copied messages don't have a link to the original message. Album grouping is kept for copied messages. On success, an array of MessageId of the sent messages is returned.
object.html_description: Use this method to copy messages of any kind. If some of the specified messages can't be found or copied, they are skipped. Service messages, paid media messages, giveaway messages, giveaway winners messages, and invoice messages can't be copied. A quiz poll can be copied only if the value of the field correct_option_id is known to the bot. The method is analogous to the method forwardMessages, but the copied messages don't have a link to the original message. Album grouping is kept for copied messages. On success, an array of MessageId of the sent messages is returned.
object.rst_description: Use this method to copy messages of any kind. If some of the specified messages can't be found or copied, they are skipped. Service messages, paid media messages, giveaway messages, giveaway winners messages, and invoice messages can't be copied. A quiz :class:`aiogram.methods.poll.Poll` can be copied only if the value of the field *correct_option_id* is known to the bot. The method is analogous to the method :class:`aiogram.methods.forward_messages.ForwardMessages`, but the copied messages don't have a link to the original message. Album grouping is kept for copied messages. On success, an array of :class:`aiogram.types.message_id.MessageId` of the sent messages is returned.

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format :code:`@channelusername`)
annotations.name: chat_id

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the target message thread (topic) of the forum; for forum supergroups only
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for the target message thread (topic) of the forum; for forum supergroups only
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the target message thread (topic) of the forum; for forum supergroups only
annotations.name: message_thread_id

annotations.description: Identifier of the direct messages topic to which the messages will be sent; required if the messages are sent to a direct messages chat
annotations.html_description: Identifier of the direct messages topic to which the messages will be sent; required if the messages are sent to a direct messages chat
annotations.rst_description: Identifier of the direct messages topic to which the messages will be sent; required if the messages are sent to a direct messages chat
annotations.name: direct_messages_topic_id

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the chat where the original messages were sent (or channel username in the format @channelusername)
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for the chat where the original messages were sent (or channel username in the format @channelusername)
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the chat where the original messages were sent (or channel username in the format :code:`@channelusername`)
annotations.name: from_chat_id

annotations.description: A JSON-serialized list of 1-100 identifiers of messages in the chat from_chat_id to copy. The identifiers must be specified in a strictly increasing order.
annotations.html_description: A JSON-serialized list of 1-100 identifiers of messages in the chat from_chat_id to copy. The identifiers must be specified in a strictly increasing order.
annotations.rst_description: A JSON-serialized list of 1-100 identifiers of messages in the chat *from_chat_id* to copy. The identifiers must be specified in a strictly increasing order.
annotations.name: message_ids

annotations.description: Sends the messages silently. Users will receive a notification with no sound.
annotations.html_description: Sends the messages silently. Users will receive a notification with no sound.
annotations.rst_description: Sends the messages `silently <https://telegram.org/blog/channels-2-0#silent-messages>`_. Users will receive a notification with no sound.
annotations.name: disable_notification

annotations.description: Protects the contents of the sent messages from forwarding and saving
annotations.html_description: Protects the contents of the sent messages from forwarding and saving
annotations.rst_description: Protects the contents of the sent messages from forwarding and saving
annotations.name: protect_content

annotations.description: Pass True to copy the messages without their captions
annotations.html_description: Pass True to copy the messages without their captions
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` to copy the messages without their captions
annotations.name: remove_caption
